etymology.description: 周(around; all-around) + 游(travel; roam) = travel around.
etymology.interpretation: Conveys moving through many places or all around a region. Often used with scope words like 世界 or 全国 to indicate breadth.
etymology.simplification: 遊 was simplified to 游 by adopting the already common character 游, reducing strokes and merging the senses of roaming/traveling with the 'to swim/play' graph.

parts.english: to travel; to roam; to wander; to swim

examples.chinese: 他计划周游世界(他計劃周遊世界)。
examples.english: He plans to travel around the world.

examples.chinese: 她喜欢独自周游各地(她喜歡獨自周遊各地)。
examples.pinyin: Tā xǐhuān dúzì zhōu yóu gèdì.
examples.english: She likes to travel around different places alone.

examples.chinese: 他们周游全国，体验不同的风俗(他們周遊全國，體驗不同的風俗)。
examples.pinyin: Tāmen zhōu yóu quán guó, tǐyàn bùtóng de fēngsú.
examples.english: They travel around the country and experience different customs.
